title: Spot on: bend
teaser: Bend is a bendy hybrid between a static symmetrical table lamp and a flexible work lamp, resulting in a product that combines the long-lived tradition of interior lighting with the uncompromisingly functionalist character of classic, industrial desk lamps.

title: Aiaiai introduces limited edition tma-2 configuration by ed banger records
teaser: AIAIAI have teamed up with Parisian electronic music staple Ed Banger Records to release a limited-edition model of the Kilo-designed TMA-2 Modular Headphone System.

title: Taper faucet by big and kibisi wins great design award
teaser: The Taper Faucet from our KiBiSi collaboration has been awarded Architectural Digest’s inaugural Great Design Award.

title: Index 2017: air pollution is trending
teaser: Air pollution is fast becoming a large and dangerous problem in urban areas. This week INDEX took a look at some innovative wearables and creative solutions from this year’s pipeline of nominations that capture and repurpose smog, including our Woobi Play kid’s mask.

title: Success so far at danish design award
teaser: Two of our products are finalists in this year’s Danish Design Awards. Woobi Play, our modular, anti-pollution mask for kids, is a finalist in the Healthy Life category, and the Biomega OKO E-bike from our KiBiSi collaboration is making headway in the Daily Life category.
